content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at Position(0,0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at Position(0,0) with coal fuel and iron ore input
- Stone furnace at Position(2,0) with coal fuel and iron ore input

### Copper Plate Production at Position(4,4)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace with coal fuel and copper ore input

### Electronic Circuit Production at Position(9.5,11.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at Position(6.5,11.5) for input storage
- Burner inserter at Position(7.5,11.5) connecting input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at Position(9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at Position(11.5,11.5) connecting assembler to output chest
- Wooden chest at Position(12.5,11.5) for output storage (currently contains 34 electronic circuits)

### Power Generation System at Position(-7,24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at Position(-9.5,24.5) producing water
- Pipe network connecting water flow
- Boiler at Position(-7,24.5) converting water to steam (powered by coal)
- Steam engine at Position(-2.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items that are not in inventory
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items into entities
- Common occurrences:
  - Trying to insert copper ore into furnaces when none available
  - Trying to insert iron ore into furnaces when none available
  - Trying to insert coal into boiler when none available

### Errors when trying to access non-existent lab
- The lab entity at Position(0.5,28.5) does not exist
- Ensure the lab is actually placed before trying to access it
- Verify the correct position coordinates when accessing entities

### Resource Management Tips
- Maintain better tracking of resource levels
- Harvest resources before they completely run out
- Keep coal supplies adequate for all fuel-consuming entities
